name: Fastest Gun in the West (ralh)
description:
Fastest Gun in the West

You are the fastest gunslinger in the Wild West.

However, every lowly thug (and snake) out there wants to challenge that title - show them their place as you fend off hordes of outlaws.

🏆 Winner of the GamesPlusJam2021 🏆

Original jam version can still be found here.

Controls
  • Aim with mouse / finger
  • Shoot with left mouse button / single touch
  • Reload with right mouse button / R key / double touch
Supported platforms
  • Desktop Browser
  • Windows Desktop
  • Android - Google Play coming soon!
  • Mobile Browser - only Chrome, leaderboards not supported yet

Follow future development on Twitter!

Notice for Android players

Due to a slight error on my part, if you installed the Android version from the jam edition, you will have to manually uninstall it. You won't be able to install the new application otherwise.
